alert.note: Alert for Lower Chehalis Valley Area; Southwest Interior (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 3:47PM PST until January 09 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Southwest Interior and Lower Chehalis Valley Area. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A few wind gusts could reach even higher levels as the cold front passes eastward across the region but these should be sporadic and short-lived.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lower Chehalis Valley Area; Southwest Interior
